name: Coursera John Hopkins Practical Machine Learning Course Project
tagline: Qualitative Assessment of Weight Lifting Exercises with Machine Learning
body:
The course assignment for the [Practical Machine Learning course](https://www.coursera.org/learn/practical-machine-learning) offered by John Hopkins University on the [Coursera](https://www.coursera.org/) platform was an exercise in applying a number of machine learning techniques to build and evaluate model capable of predicting the activity class for controlled variations of a Unilateral Dumbbell Biceps Curl exercise conducted by 6 human subjects. The [analysis](https://github.com/djdgalbraith/cjhdsspml/blob/master/project/ExerciseQuality.Rmd) was conducted using RStudio and [published](https://github.com/djdgalbraith/cjhdsspml/blob/master/project/ExerciseQuality.html) to GitHub.
